channel.title: Fix the advanced search?
channel.description:
Not a big issue, at all. When mitb was merged to this site, a bunch of settings went out of whack (I'm sure a lot of you know of a few). Well since they've all generally been fixed, I figured I'd point out that this one last issue.
[url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=search;advanced]Click me[/url] if you expand the boards to search in you'd notice that there are a few boards on there that we don't exactly have here.

item.title: Fix the advanced search?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:541594”]We do have those boards.

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?show_archived=1

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?show_archived=0 to hide them again[/quote]

TIL

Read full topic
